title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 356.2 - Tables to determine the amount of temporary contributions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 356.2 - Tables to determine the amount of temporary contributions

State Regulations
(a) In
determining the amount of temporary contributions to be reported and paid, an
employer may use for each of his employees whichever of the following tables
applies to the payroll period of such employee. If an employee is paid, in
whole or in part, at other intervals, his contribution and that of his employer
shall each be determined at the rate of one tenth of one percent of wages paid, but shall not be more than the equivalent of six cents per week for the
employee and a like amount for the employer. TABLE I
For employees paid weekly

Wages

Employee
contributions
$ 0.00 - $ 4.99....... none
5.00 - 14.99....... $.01
15.00 - 24.99........02
25.00 - 34.99........03
35.00 - 44.99........04
45.00 - 54.99........05
55.00 - and over........06

(b) If an employee who is paid daily performs
services for his employer on three or more days in a week, his contribution for
such week shall be computed on the wages paid to him by the employer for such
week and under Table I. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
356.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
